summary.span: 表示單一資料列的資料和它的中繼資料。

span.span: Represents a single row of data and its metadata.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可搭配使用從 managed 程式碼預存程序時，將結果集傳送到用戶端。This class is used together with to send result sets to the client from managed code stored-procedures. 當撰寫 common language runtime (CLR) 應用程式，應該重新使用現有的`SqlDataRecord`而不是每次建立新的物件。When writing common language runtime (CLR) applications, you should re-use existing `SqlDataRecord` objects instead of creating new ones every time. 建立許多新`SqlDataRecord`物件可能會嚴重耗盡記憶體和效能產生負面影響。Creating many new `SqlDataRecord` objects could severely deplete memory and adversely affect performance. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立數個物件，其會描述記錄的資料行中繼資料，以及建立。The following example shows how to create several objects, which describe the column metadata of a record, and creating a . 資料行值設定，傳送給呼叫程式使用類別。The column values of the are set and the is sent to the calling program by using the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您取得的二進位值的單一呼叫或區塊 （chunk）。This method enables you to obtain a binary value either in a single call or in chunks. 取得區塊 （chunk） 的值是適用於大數值或未知大小的值。Getting the value in chunks is useful for large values or values of unknown size. 若要取得數個區塊 （chunk） 中的值，配置的位元組陣列的區塊大小和呼叫重複，調整`fieldOffset`參數據以在每個呼叫。To obtain the value in several chunks, allocate a byte array of the chunk-size and call repeatedly, adjusting the `fieldOffset` parameter accordingly in each call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 型別資料行的值會複製到`values`做為參數傳遞的陣列。The SQL Server type values of the column are copied into the `values` array that is passed as a parameter. 對於 null 值，Sql 型別執行個體傳回 where屬性為 true。For null values, a Sql type instance is returned where the property is true. 長度`values`陣列不需要符合的記錄中的資料行數目。The length of the `values` array does not need to match the number of columns in the record. 如果陣列長度大於資料行數目，所有資料行值複製到陣列;如果它小於做時，只有陣列長度的資料行值數目會複製到陣列中，從資料行值與序數 0 開始。If the array length is greater than the number of columns, all of the column values are copied into the array; if it is less, only the array length number of column values are copied into the array, starting at the column value with ordinal 0.

exception.span: 為 。

exception.span: 類型不符。
